Package org.neo4j.kernel.recovery

Class Recovery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.recovery.Recovery
  • public final class Recovery
extends Object
    Utility class to perform store recovery or check is recovery is required. Recovery is required and can/will be performed on database that have at least one transaction in transaction log after last available checkpoint. During recovery all recorded changes from transaction logs will be replayed and in the end checkpoint will be performed. Please note that recovery will not gonna wait for all affected indexes populations to finish.

      • recoveryFacade

        public static RecoveryFacade recoveryFacade​(FileSystemAbstraction fs,
                                            PageCache pageCache,
                                            Tracers tracers,
                                            Config config,
                                            StorageEngineFactory storageEngineFactory,
                                            MemoryTracker memoryTracker)
        Provide recovery helper that can perform recovery of some database described by DatabaseLayout.
        Parameters:
        fs - database filesystem
        pageCache - page cache used to perform database recovery.
        tracers - underlying operation tracers
        config - custom configuration
        storageEngineFactory - StorageEngineFactory for the storage to recover.
        Returns:
        helper recovery checker

      • isRecoveryRequired

        public static boolean isRecoveryRequired​(DatabaseLayout databaseLayout,
                                         Config config,
                                         MemoryTracker memoryTracker)
                                  throws Exception
        Check if recovery is required for a store described by provided layout. Custom root location for transaction logs can be provided using GraphDatabaseSettings.transaction_logs_root_path config setting value.
        Parameters:
        databaseLayout - layout of database to check for recovery
        config - custom configuration
        Returns:
        true if recovery is required, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • performRecovery

        public static void performRecovery​(DatabaseLayout databaseLayout,
                                   DatabaseTracers tracers,
                                   MemoryTracker memoryTracker)
                            throws Exception
        Performs recovery of database described by provided layout. Transaction logs should be located in their default location. If recovery is not required nothing will be done to the the database or logs. Note: used by external tools.
        Parameters:
        databaseLayout - database to recover layout.
        tracers - underlying events tracers.
        Throws:
        Exception

        databaseLayout - layout of database to check for recovery
        config - custom configuration

        pageCache - page cache used to perform database recovery.
        config - custom configuration
        databaseLayout - database to recover layout.

        public static void performRecovery​(FileSystemAbstraction fs,

        Performs recovery of database described by provided layout.
        Parameters:
        fs - database filesystem
        pageCache - page cache used to perform database recovery.
        tracers - underlying operation tracers
        config - custom configuration
        databaseLayout - database to recover layout.
        storageEngineFactory - StorageEngineFactory for the storage to recover.
        logProvider - log provider
        globalMonitors - global server monitors
        extensionFactories - extension factories for extensions that should participate in recovery
        providedLogFiles - log files from database
